data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=aJMRa3xV7gMQ7kNvgGo5fF3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC334VW1JiPQjKCoyLablaRz2qH0n-QDf4T4BAIDfj3Pw&oe=664F291C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=3ZPhedy7BcQQ7kNvgEP85Eu&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCnqxUfaY1VpCfkqvb5U-2MntuqQdCcqc2p2CLf4NrOpg&oe=664F32A4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=lhftKk4YkskQ7kNvgGoDTEc&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBwj5m3tRekLET0cgyUFYfh2Y3tMvqltj1ACQFsi6uxSg&oe=664F1A07)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=KCEKxLIPnxYQ7kNvgEKzLGO&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCtCo8Mn5g9XadiCB2G9qnbvQyPGESSQ7fjG6Nvcb-y6Q&oe=664F0CE6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=qF2WfIRWg2cQ7kNvgGfr4lQ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCMiflsnP_Y7NOAnrz3ELLJpSbGsVhuwbtP9-tKQu9jlw&oe=664F3958)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=HyYjP-SSxoEQ7kNvgHt101U&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCV6qQHlsYt3CSn-vvUfnn3hNBPdOMdlyYaSmveP-3fcg&oe=664F35D9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=JmX2MWg3yX8Q7kNvgHtlvM8&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCrr7pr82M0g54R3ke2Rs46eI4s1NUbBQrUHLlWkR6HFg&oe=664F1BF0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=uB7ph67BONcQ7kNvgG3Hiv8&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCLXWOzpZjLUO7X76BTJridJ18fxbBva-cFvABrVBdN4A&oe=664F066A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Sql4tJXdkT0Q7kNvgE52iUR&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCbxLUrIGCVV1tvxdmkxFoKENTqcE6KCt9xw_m5cXTwEw&oe=664F1A17)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=o2g2s4TG--oQ7kNvgE6Hfw0&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD_b01RLLMgo8R7cqo1DRCtxoV3_dzO_t6cWu2biFq2ug&oe=664F358C)
